title: Emerald and Diamond Statement Haram - "Aabharanam"
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Finished with traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the classic Haram. Features a graduated design with intricate floral and leaf patterns meticulously set with shimmering diamonds. Accented with vibrant emeralds and delicate freshwater pearl drops for a touch of elegance. The piece showcases exceptional craftsmanship with a focus on detail.
colors: Ivory (Pearls). A harmonious blend of colors creating a rich and captivating look.
occasions: and high-profile events. Ideal for muhurtham
or even a sophisticated cocktail party.
description: This stunning Haram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, and freshwater pearls ensures lasting beauty and value. Its intricate design and impeccable craftsmanship make it a true statement piece, guaranteed to turn heads and elevate any outfit. A testament to Hyderabadi jewelry artistry.
